data.label: Process Approval
data.script: processData.status = 'APPROVED'; processData.approvedAt = new Date().toISOString(); processData.message = 'Loan approved!';

data.label: Process Rejection
data.script: processData.status = 'REJECTED'; processData.rejectedAt = new Date().toISOString(); processData.message = 'Loan rejected due to risk score or manager decision.';

data.label: Ticket Submitted
data.trigger: User submits support ticket via portal, email, or API
data.description: Initiates the ticket management workflow when a new support request is received

data.label: Initial Validation
data.description: Validates ticket contains all required information and follows submission guidelines

data.label: Validation Check
data.condition: Determines if ticket passes initial validation checks
data.description: Routes ticket based on validation results - valid tickets proceed, invalid return to user

data.label: Request Additional Info
data.instructions: Please provide missing information or clarify your request

data.label: Auto-Categorize & Prioritize
data.description: Automatically categorizes ticket and assigns initial priority using machine learning

data.label: Priority & Complexity Analysis
data.condition: Routes based on ticket priority and complexity level
data.description: Determines routing path: high priority escalation, standard processing, or simple auto-resolution

data.label: Auto-Resolution Attempt
data.script: Knowledge base lookup and automated solution matching
data.description: Attempts to resolve simple, common issues automatically using knowledge base

data.label: Escalation Alert
data.template: High priority ticket requires immediate attention
data.description: Alerts senior support staff of high-priority tickets requiring urgent attention

data.label: Assignment Strategy
data.branches: Parallel assignment to multiple support teams and knowledge capture
data.description: Simultaneously assigns to appropriate support team and initiates knowledge management processes

data.label: Technical Resolution
data.instructions: Investigate and resolve the technical issue following troubleshooting procedures

data.label: Knowledge Base Update
data.description: Captures resolution steps and updates knowledge base for future similar issues

data.label: Resolution Notification
data.template: Your support ticket has been resolved
data.description: Notifies customer that their issue has been resolved and ticket is closed

data.label: SLA Timer
data.description: Monitors ticket resolution time against SLA commitments

data.label: Customer Satisfaction Survey
data.instructions: Please rate your satisfaction with the support provided

data.label: Ticket Closed
data.result: Support ticket successfully processed and closed
data.description: Ticket lifecycle complete - issue resolved and customer notified

data.label: Resolution Status Check
data.condition: Checks if ticket was successfully resolved or needs escalation
data.description: Determines next steps based on resolution attempt results or SLA timeout

data.label: Escalate to Senior Team
data.instructions: Complex issue requiring senior technical expertise or management intervention

data.label: Submit Expense Report
data.description: Employee submits expense report for approval

data.label: Validate Expense Data
data.description: Validates expense report for completeness and business rules

data.label: Amount-Based Routing
data.description: Determines approval path based on expense amount

data.label: Manager Approval
data.instructions: Review and approve expense report under $1000

data.label: Director Approval
data.instructions: Review and approve expense report $1000-$5000

data.label: VP + Finance Approval
data.instructions: Review and approve expense report over $5000

data.label: Approval Decision
data.condition: Check if expense is approved or rejected
data.description: Routes based on approval decision

data.label: Approval Notification
data.template: expense_approved_template
data.description: Notifies employee that expense was approved

data.label: Process Payment
data.description: Initiates payment processing for approved expense

data.label: Rejection Notification
data.template: expense_rejected_template
data.description: Notifies employee that expense was rejected with reason

data.label: Resubmit Expense
data.instructions: Address rejection reasons and resubmit expense report

data.label: Approval Reminder
data.description: Sends reminder if approval is overdue

data.label: Overdue Reminder
data.template: approval_overdue_template
data.description: Reminds approver and escalates to manager

data.label: Expense Processed
data.description: Expense workflow completed successfully

data.label: Expense Cancelled
data.description: Expense workflow terminated by employee

data.label: Submit Leave Request
data.description: Employee initiates leave request through form

data.label: Validate Leave Request
data.description: Validates leave request data and business rules

data.label: Check Leave Duration
data.description: Routes based on leave duration and type

data.label: Manager Approval
data.instructions: Review and approve/reject leave request

data.label: HR & Manager Approval
data.instructions: Review extended leave request (>5 days)

data.label: Manager Decision
data.description: Routes based on manager approval/rejection

data.label: HR & Manager Decision
data.description: Routes based on HR and manager approval/rejection

data.label: Approval Deadline
data.description: Escalates if no response within 48 hours

data.label: Approval Notification
data.template: Leave request approved - details and next steps
data.description: Notifies employee of approved leave request

data.label: Rejection Notification
data.template: Leave request rejected - reason and resubmission option
data.description: Notifies employee of rejected request with feedback

data.template: Leave approval overdue - requires attention
data.description: Alerts senior management of overdue approval

data.script: Deduct approved leave days from employee balance
data.description: Updates employee leave balance in system

data.label: Resubmit Leave Request
data.instructions: Modify and resubmit leave request based on feedback

data.description: Leave request workflow ended with rejection

data.template: Employee leave schedule notification
data.description: Updates team calendar with approved leave dates

data.description: Leave request workflow completed

data.label: Submit Leave Request
data.description: Employee submits leave request with details

data.description: Validate leave request details and employee eligibility

data.instructions: Review and approve/reject leave request (1-5 days)

data.instructions: Review and approve/reject extended leave request (5+ days)

data.label: Manager Decision
data.description: Manager approval or rejection decision

data.template: Leave request approved - details and next steps

data.label: New Ticket Submitted
data.trigger: User ticket submission or system alert
data.description: Initiates ticket processing workflow when new support request is received

data.label: SLA Timer
data.description: Monitors ticket for SLA breach and triggers escalation if needed

data.label: Validate Ticket Data
data.description: Validates ticket submission for completeness and format

data.label: Escalate to Senior
data.instructions: Handle escalated ticket requiring senior expertise

data.label: Auto-Classify Ticket
data.script: Analyze ticket content and assign category/priority
data.description: Uses ML algorithm to categorize and prioritize ticket automatically

data.label: Handle Validation Error
data.script: Log error and send rejection notice to submitter
data.description: Error handler for invalid ticket submissions

data.label: Priority Assessment
data.description: Routes ticket based on priority level and complexity

data.label: Ticket Closed
data.description: End of ticket management workflow with successful resolution

data.label: Auto-Resolve Simple Issues
data.script: Check knowledge base for automated resolution
data.description: Attempts automatic resolution for low priority common issues

data.label: Assignment Strategy
data.description: Initiates parallel assignment and stakeholder notification

data.label: Manual Manager Review
data.instructions: Review high priority ticket and assign specialist

data.label: Auto-Assign Agent
data.script: Round-robin assignment based on workload and skills
data.description: Automatically assigns ticket to best available agent

data.label: Notify Stakeholders
data.template: Ticket created and assigned notification
data.description: Sends notifications to customer and assigned agent

data.label: Agent Work on Ticket
data.instructions: Work on ticket resolution following standard procedures

data.label: Resolution Notification
data.template: Ticket resolution notification with solution details
data.description: Notifies customer of ticket resolution and solution

data.label: Resolution Check

data.description: Determines if ticket is resolved or requires further action

data.label: Customer Feedback
data.instructions: Please rate your support experience and provide feedback

data.label: Close Ticket
data.script: Update ticket status and generate closure report
data.description: Finalizes ticket closure and updates system records

name: AI-Powered Support Ticket Sentiment Analysis Workflow

data.label: Ticket Submitted
data.description: New support ticket received through web portal or email

data.label: Validate Ticket Data
data.description: Ensure all mandatory fields are present and properly formatted

data.label: Validation Check
data.condition: Check if ticket data is complete and valid
data.description: Route based on validation results

data.label: Request Missing Information
data.instructions: Contact customer to obtain missing required information

data.label: AI Sentiment Analysis
data.prompt: Analyze the sentiment of this support ticket: {ticket_description}. Extract: 1) Overall sentiment (positive/neutral/negative/urgent), 2) Emotional intensity (1-10), 3) Key concerns, 4) Urgency indicators
data.description: Analyze customer sentiment and extract emotional context from ticket

data.label: Sentiment Classification
data.condition: Route based on sentiment analysis results
data.description: Determine workflow path based on detected sentiment and urgency

data.label: Parallel Processing Split
data.branches: Simultaneous category classification and priority assignment
data.description: Split workflow to handle classification and priority in parallel

data.label: Critical Alert
data.template: URGENT: Extremely negative sentiment detected in ticket #{ticket_id}
data.description: Immediate alert for highly negative customer sentiment

data.label: Ticket Categorization
data.prompt: Categorize this support ticket into one of: Technical Issue, Billing Inquiry, Feature Request, Bug Report, Account Access, General Question. Consider: {ticket_description} and sentiment: {sentiment}
data.description: Automatically categorize ticket based on content and sentiment

data.label: Calculate Priority Score
data.script: const urgency = processData.urgencyScore; const intensity = processData.emotionalIntensity; return urgency * 0.6 + intensity * 0.4;
data.description: Calculate composite priority score from urgency and emotional intensity

data.label: Immediate Manager Review
data.instructions: Critical escalation - customer extremely upset, requires immediate manager intervention

data.label: Parallel Join & Priority Check
data.condition: Evaluate final priority score after parallel processing
data.description: Merge parallel paths and route based on calculated priority

data.label: High Priority Assignment
data.instructions: High priority ticket requiring immediate attention - negative sentiment detected

data.label: Standard Queue Timer
data.description: Wait 4 hours before escalation if ticket remains unassigned

data.label: Regular Assignment
data.instructions: Standard ticket assignment based on sentiment analysis and categorization

data.label: Escalation Alert
data.template: High priority ticket #{ticket_id} assigned with {sentiment} sentiment
data.description: Notify management of high-priority ticket assignments

data.label: Update Ticket Database
data.output: Updated ticket record with AI insights
data.description: Store sentiment analysis, category, and priority in ticket system

data.label: Customer Acknowledgment
data.template: Your ticket #{ticket_id} has been received and assigned to our {category} team
data.description: Send automated confirmation to customer with ticket details

data.label: Ticket Processed
data.result: Ticket successfully analyzed, categorized, and assigned
data.description: Initial ticket processing complete with AI-powered sentiment analysis

data.label: Start Feedback Processing
data.trigger: Scheduled batch or real-time feedback ingestion
data.description: Initiates customer feedback processing pipeline

data.label: Extract Feedback Data
data.input: Surveys, reviews, social media, support tickets
data.description: Collect feedback from all configured sources

data.label: Schema Validation
data.description: Validate basic data structure and format

data.label: Schema Valid?
data.description: Route based on schema validation results

data.label: Log Validation Errors
data.output: Error logs and dead letter queue
data.description: Log rejected records for investigation

data.label: Data Cleansing
data.description: Remove HTML, normalize whitespace, handle encoding

data.label: Alert Data Quality Issues
data.template: Schema validation failures detected
data.description: Notify team of data quality issues

data.label: Business Rules Validation
data.description: Apply business rules to cleaned data

data.label: Business Rules Pass?
data.description: Route based on business rules validation

data.label: Log Business Rule Violations
data.description: Log records failing business validation

data.label: AI Sentiment Analysis
data.prompt: Analyze the sentiment of this customer feedback: {feedback_text}. Return: {"sentiment": "positive|negative|neutral", "confidence": 0-1, "reasoning": "explanation"}
data.description: Analyze customer sentiment using AI

data.label: AI Issue Extraction
data.prompt: Extract key issues and topics from this feedback: {feedback_text}. Return: {"issues": [{"category": "category_name", "issue": "specific_issue", "severity": "low|medium|high"}], "topics": ["topic1", "topic2"]}
data.description: Extract key issues and topics using AI

data.label: AI Results Validation
data.description: Validate AI analysis results

data.label: AI Results Valid?
data.description: Route based on AI results validation

data.label: Manual Review
data.instructions: Review and correct failed AI analysis
data.description: Human review of failed AI analysis

data.label: Enrich with Metadata
data.description: Add customer info, product info, and temporal data

data.label: Calculate Quality Scores
data.description: Calculate completeness, accuracy, and confidence scores

data.label: Final Quality Check
data.description: Final validation before data loading

data.label: Quality Check Pass?
data.description: Final quality gate before loading

data.label: Quarantine Low Quality
data.description: Store low quality records for review

data.label: Load to Analytics DB
data.description: Load processed feedback to analytics database

data.label: Update Summary Tables
data.description: Update aggregated metrics and dashboard data

data.label: Processing Complete Notification
data.template: Feedback processing batch completed successfully
data.description: Notify stakeholders of successful processing

data.label: Processing Complete
data.result: Customer feedback successfully analyzed and loaded
data.description: End of feedback processing workflow

data.label: Library Request Initiated
data.description: Starts the library management process for book checkout, return, or membership

data.label: Validate Request Data
data.description: Validates incoming request data for completeness and format

data.label: Request Type Router
data.description: Determines the type of library operation requested

data.label: Error Recovery Handler
data.description: Handles system errors and attempts recovery or escalation

data.label: Check Book Availability
data.description: Queries database to check if requested book is available

data.label: Process Book Return
data.description: Handles book return processing including condition check

data.label: Process Membership Application
data.instructions: Review membership application and verify eligibility

data.label: Library Process Complete
data.description: Library management workflow completed with all operations finalized

data.label: Book Availability Check
data.condition: Check if book is available and user eligible
data.description: Determines if book can be checked out based on availability and user status

data.label: Return Condition Check
data.condition: Check if book is damaged or overdue
data.description: Evaluates book condition and return timeliness

data.label: Membership Approval Decision
data.condition: Based on staff review and eligibility criteria
data.description: Determines whether to approve or reject membership application

data.label: Parallel Checkout Processing
data.branches: Update inventory and generate receipt simultaneously
data.description: Processes checkout operations in parallel for efficiency

data.label: Calculate Late Fees
data.description: Calculates any applicable late fees or damage charges

data.label: Overdue Book Timer
data.description: Triggers overdue processing after 24 hours past due date

data.label: AI Recommendation Engine
data.prompt: Based on user's reading history: ${processData.readingHistory} and current checkout: ${processData.currentBook}, recommend 3 similar books with brief explanations
data.description: Generates personalized book recommendations based on user preferences

data.label: Send Rejection Notice
data.template: Membership application rejection with reasons
data.description: Notifies applicant of membership rejection with explanation

data.label: Update Book Inventory
data.description: Updates book status in inventory system

data.label: Generate Checkout Receipt
data.description: Creates checkout receipt with due date information

data.label: Send Overdue Notice
data.template: Overdue book notification with late fee information
data.description: Notifies user about overdue books and applicable fees

data.label: Send Completion Notification
data.template: Library transaction completed with recommendations
data.description: Sends final notification with transaction summary and AI recommendations

data.label: Travel Request Initiated
data.description: Starts the travel request approval and booking process

data.label: Approval Timeout Monitor
data.description: Escalates if approval takes longer than 3 business days

data.label: Request Validation
data.description: Validates travel request data and business rules

data.label: Escalation Review
data.instructions: Review escalated travel request due to timeout or special circumstances

data.label: AI Travel Risk Assessment
data.prompt: Analyze this travel request for risk factors: Destination: ${processData.destination}, Purpose: ${processData.purpose}, Duration: ${processData.duration}, Budget: ${processData.budget}. Assess safety, compliance, and cost risks.
data.description: AI analyzes travel destination safety, compliance and cost risks

data.label: Approval Outcome Gateway
data.condition: Check if all required approvals are granted
data.description: Routes based on approval decision or timeout escalation

data.label: Budget & Risk Approval Router
data.condition: Route based on budget amount and risk level
data.description: Determines approval path based on budget and AI risk assessment

data.label: Booking Channel Router
data.branches: Flight, Hotel, and Ground Transport booking in parallel
data.description: Initiates parallel booking processes for approved travel

data.label: Rejection Notification
data.template: Travel request denied with reason and next steps
data.description: Notifies employee of request denial with detailed feedback

data.label: Manager Approval
data.instructions: Review and approve standard travel request under $2000

data.label: Executive Approval Split
data.branches: Finance Director and VP approval in parallel
data.description: High-value requests require parallel approval from Finance and VP

data.label: Flight Booking API
data.description: Books flight through corporate travel agency API

data.label: Hotel Booking API
data.description: Books accommodation through preferred hotel partners

data.label: Ground Transport Booking
data.description: Arranges car rental or taxi services

data.label: Request Denied
data.description: Travel request was denied due to policy, budget, or risk factors

data.label: Finance Director Approval
data.instructions: Review high-value travel request for budget compliance

data.label: VP Level Approval
data.instructions: Review high-value/high-risk travel request for strategic alignment

data.label: Travel Confirmation Package
data.template: Complete travel itinerary with booking confirmations
data.description: Sends comprehensive travel package with all bookings and details

data.label: Travel Booked Successfully
data.description: Travel request approved and all bookings completed

data.label: User Query Received
data.description: Initiates the workflow when a user submits a query to the chatbot

data.label: Generate Quirky Response
data.prompt: You are a quirky, fun, and conversational chatbot. Respond to this user query in a playful, witty, and engaging way with personality and humor. User query: ${processData.userQuery}
data.description: Uses AI to generate a quirky, conversational response to the user's query

data.label: Send Response to User
data.template: ${processData.quirkyResponse}
data.description: Delivers the quirky chatbot response back to the user

data.label: Response Delivered
data.description: Workflow completes after user receives the conversational chatbot response

data.label: Start Chatbot
data.description: Begin chatbot conversation loop

data.label: Receive User Input
data.instructions: Enter your query for the chatbot
data.description: Capture user's message input

data.label: Generate Quirky Response
data.prompt: Respond to this user query in an extremely quirky, whimsical, and humorous fashion. Be absurd and creative: ${processData.user_input}
data.description: Generate a quirky, funny response to user's query

data.label: Check for Magic Word
data.script: const magicWord = 'exit'; const userInput = processData.user_input.toLowerCase(); processData.shouldExit = userInput.includes(magicWord);
data.description: Check if user input contains magic word to exit loop

data.label: Magic Word Detected?
data.description: Decide whether to exit or continue loop

data.label: Send Response
data.template: ${processData.quirky_response}
data.description: Display quirky response to user

data.label: Exit Chatbot
data.result: Chatbot session ended with magic word
data.description: End chatbot conversation when magic word is detected
